A world where dreams are tangible and can be captured, traded, and sold like any other commodity.
A planet where dreams are manifested into physical objects or experiences, allowing people to live out their wildest fantasies.
A place where dreams are shared collectively, with the entire population experiencing the same dream at the same time.
A world where dreams are used as a form of currency, with people able to purchase goods and services using their dreams as payment.
A planet where dreams are the only form of communication, with people communicating with each other through their dreams.
